---
title: "Contact"
subtitle: "Get in Touch"
page-layout: full
title-block-banner: false
css: 
  - assets/css/about-new.css
  - assets/css/about-animations.css
format:
  html:
    include-in-header: 
      - text: |
          <style>
          body { margin: 0; padding: 0; }
          .quarto-title-block { display: none !important; }
          .contact-redirect {
            min-height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1a1a2e 0%, #16213e 50%, #0f3460 100%);
            color: white;
            text-align: center;
            padding: 2rem;
          }
          .redirect-content {
            max-width: 600px;
            animation: fadeInUp 1s ease-out;
          }
          .redirect-content h1 {
            font-size: 3rem;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff, #e94560);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
          }
          .redirect-content p {
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            opacity: 0.9;
            line-height: 1.6;
          }
          .redirect-button {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 15px 30px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #e94560, #f27c00);
            color: white;
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: 50px;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(233, 69, 96, 0.3);
          }
          .redirect-button:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(233, 69, 96, 0.4);
            color: white;
            text-decoration: none;
          }
          @keyframes fadeInUp {
            0% {
              opacity: 0;
              transform: translateY(30px);
            }
            100% {
              opacity: 1;
              transform: translateY(0);
            }
          }
          </style>
      - text: |
          <script>
          // Auto-redirect after 3 seconds
          setTimeout(function() {
            window.location.href = 'pages/about/index.html#connect';
          }, 3000);
          </script>
---
